entry.title: Damianette fic
entry.summary:
Author: FoxyRouge_99

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,184Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 10

Summary: Ok so this is a working title so probs will be changed.Damian and Marinette are in a secret relationship. Their friends and family know, but no one else. when the akuma class earn a trip to gotham, of course lie-la starts to spew her lies. The Miraculous Trios (ladybug, chat noir and princess honey) are already members of the justice league. Damianette are happy to be able to spend some time together, but will it go as planned? Will lie-la and rest of the class ruin it? Will lie-la be exposed for the lying snake she truly is? All will be revealed...
